name: Twin Assault
description:
This is a vertical-scroll space shooter. You can play solo or with a friend.

Tell me what you think. Comments are greatly appreciated. :)

Enjoy!

Controls Player 1Player 2MoveWASD
Arrow keysPlay/Shoot
[F][/] Credits
  • Graphics are mainly based on Patreon's Top Down Collection by ansimuz
  • Music from Spaceship Shooter Environment by the same author
  • Sound effects from FreeSFX by kronbits
  • PowerUp sprites by Anna
  • Font: VT323 from Google Fonts
